summary: An email from the FBI Victim Services Division inviting victims of Jeffrey Epstein to attend informational meetings in New York or Florida to learn about available victim services. The document is an outreach communication related to the ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case for which victims are being contacted; the perpetrator whose victims are the recipients of this FBI briefing invitation.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing - Florida
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in Miramar, FL.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing - New York
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in New York, NY.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in September 2019.
The FBI case number referenced is NY-3027571.
Meetings were scheduled for victims in both Florida and New York in October 2019.
Victims were invited to bring one support person to the briefing.
The communication indicates an ongoing federal investigation involving the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
